bcbioSingleCell

  • News

Coerce Object

Coerce Object

Arguments

from

Class for which the coerce method will perform coercion.

Upgrade bcbioSingleCell to current version

This method adds support for upgrading bcbioSCDataSet objects to the latest bcbioSingleCell class version. This should be backwards compatible to bcbioSingleCell version 0.0.17. Previous objects saved using bcbioSinglecell (note case) will likely fail to load with newer versions of the package.

bcbioSingleCell to seurat

Interally Seurat::CreateSeuratObject() is called without applying any additional filtering cutoffs, since we have already defined them during our quality control analysis. Here we are passing the raw gene-level counts of the filtered cells into a new seurat class object, using as() object coercion.

bcbioSingleCell to SummarizedExperiment

Since bcbioSingleCell is an extension of SummarizedExperiment, this coercion method is very simple. Here we're simply dropping our @bcbio slot, which contains raw cellular barcodes and other bcbio-specific metadata.

See also

help(topic = "coerce", package = "methods").

Examples

load(system.file("extdata/filtered.rda", package = "bcbioSingleCell"))

# Coerce bcbioSingleCell to seurat
as(filtered, "seurat")
#> An object of class seurat in project bcbioSingleCell 
#>  1000 genes across 243 samples.
